thread.section_title: CarpetVista.fi arvostelut | Asiakkaiden arvostelut CarpetVista.fi | www.carpetvista.fi
thread.title: Liisa Eskola

author: Liisa Eskola
title: Liisa Eskola
text:
Just received two beautiful hand wowen carpets from CarpetVista. I ordered two carpets from them to Finland were I live.
Whole experience starting from the ordering process until the delivery was very smooth and customer friendly.
I wanted to ask and clarify some things before I placed My order and they always got back with they customer service Person e-Mail responding without any delays- actually within only couple of minutes. They responce was every time very friendly, warm, polite and clear.
The carpets were both precisely what I had ordered- no dissappontments what so ever- including the size, colour and quality.
I'm very satisfied with everything and will definitely use CarpetVista also in the future. I also recommend CarpetVista to everyone.
BR, Liisa Eskola, Finland
